titleStmt.title: A speech delivered in the Commons House of Parliament, by that judicious, and worthy gentleman, Thomas Beamount Esquire: at the presenting of the petition of the knights, gentlemen, and freeholders, of the county of Leicester, on Wednesday the 6. of November, 1644. Also a true copie of the petition it selfe, subscribed with above 2000. hands.
titleStmt.author: Beamount, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: The petition requests the appointment of Lord Grey of Groby as virtual governor of Leicestershire.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
